{"step_by_step_thinking": "Rugby headgear is designed to protect the ears and the head from cuts and abrasions, but it is not designed to prevent concussions. Concussions are caused by the brain moving inside the skull, which can happen even when the head is protected by a helmet or headgear. Therefore, while rugby headgear can reduce the risk of some types of head injuries, it cannot prevent concussions.", "answer_choice": "B. no"}
